Package com.uk.tsl.rfid.asciiprotocol.device

Class ObservableReaderList

java.lang.Object
com.uk.tsl.rfid.asciiprotocol.device.ObservableReaderList
public class ObservableReaderList extends Object
A List of Reader instances that provides observable events for Add, Remove and Modification of its elements

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ObservableReaderList()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    add(Reader reader)
    Add a reader to the list
    void
    clearList(boolean willRaiseEvents)
    Clear the list - optionally mReaderRemovedEvent fires for each reader
    ArrayList<Reader>
    list()
     
    Observable<Reader>
    readerAddedEvent()
    A reader was added - arg1 will hold the Reader concerned This event does not fire when the entire list is changed
    Observable<Reader>
    readerRemovedEvent()
    A reader was removed - arg1 will hold the Reader concerned This event does not fire when the entire list is changed
    Observable<Reader>
    readerUpdatedEvent()
    A reader was updated - arg1 will hold the Reader concerned This event does not fire when the entire list is changed
    void
    remove(Reader reader)
    Remove a reader from the list Note: Observers will be notified before the Reader instance is removed from the list but communication with the Reader is no longer possible at this stage
    void
    setList(ArrayList<Reader> list)
     
    void
    updated(Reader reader)
    Register that the given reader from the list has been updated

  • Method Details

    • list

      public ArrayList<Reader> list()
      Returns:
      The list of available Readers

    • setList

      public void setList(ArrayList<Reader> list)

    • readerAddedEvent

      public Observable<Reader> readerAddedEvent()
      A reader was added - arg1 will hold the Reader concerned This event does not fire when the entire list is changed

    • readerRemovedEvent

      public Observable<Reader> readerRemovedEvent()
      A reader was removed - arg1 will hold the Reader concerned This event does not fire when the entire list is changed

    • readerUpdatedEvent

      public Observable<Reader> readerUpdatedEvent()
      A reader was updated - arg1 will hold the Reader concerned This event does not fire when the entire list is changed

    • clearList

      public void clearList(boolean willRaiseEvents)
      Clear the list - optionally mReaderRemovedEvent fires for each reader

    • add

      public void add(Reader reader)
      Add a reader to the list
      Parameters:
      reader - the Reader to add

    • remove

      public void remove(Reader reader)
      Remove a reader from the list Note: Observers will be notified before the Reader instance is removed from the list but communication with the Reader is no longer possible at this stage
      Parameters:
      reader - the Reader to remove

    • updated

      public void updated(Reader reader)
      Register that the given reader from the list has been updated
      Parameters:
      reader - the Reader that has been updated
